homes_hear_details: New Hampshire has launched its HOMES and HEAR rebate programs under the Inflation Reduction Act. The New Hampshire Office of Strategic Initiatives, in coordination with NHSaves, is administering the programs to provide rebates for whole-home energy efficiency improvements and high-efficiency electric appliances.
state_energy_office: New Hampshire Office of Strategic Initiatives - Energy Division

income_thresholds.low_income_80_ami: For New Hampshire, 80% of Area Median Income varies by county. In Hillsborough County (Manchester/Nashua), 80% AMI for a family of four is approximately $78,550. Rural counties may be lower.
income_thresholds.moderate_income_150_ami: For New Hampshire, 150% of Area Median Income varies by county. In Hillsborough County (Manchester/Nashua), 150% AMI for a family of four is approximately $147,300.

net_metering: New Hampshire has a net metering policy for systems up to 1 MW. Residential customers receive a credit for excess generation at the default energy service rate. The state adopted a net metering replacement framework in 2017, with credits reflecting the value of distributed generation.

state_rebate_programs.name: NHSaves Residential Rebate Programs
state_rebate_programs.amount: Up to $500 for heat pumps per head, up to $4,000 for weatherization, $50-$150 for ENERGY STAR appliances
state_rebate_programs.eligible_items: Heat pumps (ductless mini-splits and ducted), insulation, air sealing, smart thermostats, ENERGY STAR appliances, heat pump water heaters
state_rebate_programs.details: NHSaves is a collaborative of New Hampshire's electric and gas utilities offering energy efficiency programs funded through the System Benefits Charge. Programs include Home Performance with ENERGY STAR, appliance rebates, and weatherization incentives.

state_rebate_programs.name: Weatherization Assistance Program
state_rebate_programs.administrator: New Hampshire Office of Strategic Initiatives
state_rebate_programs.amount: Average expenditure of approximately $8,000 per home
state_rebate_programs.eligible_items: Insulation, air sealing, heating system repair or replacement, window and door improvements
state_rebate_programs.details: Federally funded program for income-qualifying households at or below 200% of federal poverty level. Administered through Community Action Agencies.

programs.name: NHSaves Heat Pump Rebates
programs.amount: Up to $500 per indoor head for qualifying ductless mini-split heat pumps
programs.eligible_items: ENERGY STAR certified ductless mini-split heat pumps and ducted heat pump systems

programs.name: NHSaves Home Performance with ENERGY STAR
programs.amount: Up to 50% of project cost, up to $4,000 for weatherization improvements
programs.eligible_items: Insulation, air sealing, duct sealing, heating system upgrades following a home energy audit

programs.name: NHSaves Appliance Rebates
programs.eligible_items: Heat pump water heaters, smart thermostats, ENERGY STAR dryers, dehumidifiers

programs.name: NHSaves Residential Efficiency Rebates
programs.amount: Up to $500 per heat pump head, up to $4,000 for weatherization
programs.eligible_items: Heat pumps, insulation, air sealing, ENERGY STAR appliances

programs.name: NHSaves Residential Programs
programs.amount: Up to $500 per heat pump head, up to $4,000 for weatherization
programs.eligible_items: Heat pumps, insulation, air sealing, ENERGY STAR appliances, heat pump water heaters
